subsection_content:
With nutrition for people after stroke, it is important to note:
Minimize sodium content, don't eat too salty foods;; Limit eating too much, feeling too full causes high fat absorption, increasing the risk of obesity;; Eat lots of green vegetables and fruits;; Diverse groups of nutrients;; Add low-fat protein and cut down on saturated fat and trans fat.
You should limit foods rich in cholesterol to ensure your health after a stroke

tai bien mach mau nao.json. Nutrition
With nutrition for people after stroke, it is important to note:
Minimize sodium content, don't eat too salty foods;; Limit eating too much, feeling too full causes high fat absorption, increasing the risk of obesity;; Eat lots of green vegetables and fruits;; Diverse groups of nutrients;; Add low-fat protein and cut down on saturated fat and trans fat.
